/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a pedestrian's viewpoint on the sidewalk, immersing the viewer in the city's daily life. The street is flanked by buildings painted in vibrant hues of red and orange, their facades adorned with ornate details that hint at the rich architectural heritage of the city. The sky above is a clear blue, providing a striking contrast to the colorful buildings. Trees line the street, their lush green foliage adding a touch of nature to the urban landscape. Cars parked along the side of the road add a dynamic element to the scene, reflecting the city's active lifestyle.
